entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 4 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Clearing before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 6 April 2023
